summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 36th Avenue Southwest, from West Hanford Street to Bronson Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by the construction of sewers, and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8680 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
